channel.title: Treasure Trooper No Longer Pays By Paypal!
channel.description:
After the May payment, Treasure Trooper will no longer pay by paypal, only by mail. Read the whole story here: [url=http://forum.treasuretrooper.com/index.php?showtopic=15021]http://forum.treasuretrooper.com/index.php?showtopic=15021[/url]
So now, what to do? I am here to tell you that CashCrate actully gives you more money, and still pay by Paypal.
Proof: [url=http://www.cashcrate.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=25]http://www.cashcrate.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=25[/url]
Technically, It looks as if I am trying to get referrals, and I am. [size=14pt]But you can remove the number if you want.[/size] It doesn't hurt you at all to be my referral, just is more money for me, and that of course is a nice thing.
[url=http://www.cashcrate.com/index.php?ref=25032]http://www.cashcrate.com/index.php?ref=25032[/url]

item.title: Treasure Trooper No Longer Pays By Paypal!
item.dc:creator: @ipl0x ipl0x
item.description:
@ipl0x wrote:

[quote=“KyleGut3, post:19, topic:2980”]Its the cocaine… you’d have to be a pretty classy whore to get that much cash.

ontopic:
ill have to try this place out then :)[/quote]
Damnit, I spesifically posted “secret” and you guess it with 1 try… sigh
But its true, I would proove to u if you lived around here.

Read full topic

item.title: Treasure Trooper No Longer Pays By Paypal!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

No, trust me no one wants to work at the tim hortons where I am, just trust me on that one. Also, the dairy queen(place Y) only hires females anyways, never in its history has a male worked there. These are things that you may not understand unless you actually lived where I am.

edit* Crap, not grocery store, it is an ice cream shop >.<

Read full topic
item.source: Treasure Trooper No Longer Pays By Paypal!

item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I refuse to work at Tim Hortons(Only fat fags work there), and the only other place is a grocery store, and ONLY girls works there.

Ah, so you’re too homophobic too work at place X and you’re too scared of girls to work at Y. It sounds like you have some gender identity issues.

item.title: Treasure Trooper No Longer Pays By Paypal!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Jobs are not always easy to get.

I am only 15, and I live in a very small town. There is no work. I tried macdonalds, they want me to be 16 for insurance reasons. I tried the local grocery store, he said my grades in school were not good enough(lol like wtf?) and I refuse to work at Tim Hortons(Only fat fags work there), and the only other place is a edit Icecream shopeedit, and ONLY girls works there.

Read full topic
